SCRIPT.MSCRI: :set &time# = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS") curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data "{\"channel\": \"##s5a_sqa_autoupdates\", \"username\": \"DB Refresh from Slot0 - INITIATED\", \"text\": \" \", \"icon_emoji\": \":db:\"} " https://hooks.slack.com/services/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
